item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0687; 10:56AM; 5014 S Crenshaw Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uehNbm; #HydePark; It took 24 firefighters 21 minutes to extinguish the flames inside of one upstairs unit in a two-story apartment building. No reported injuries. title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire #RandallFire 11/30/2022 INC#0123

item.description: Update #RandallFire Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0123; 04:00AM; 10930 W Randall St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Vlry3j; #ShadowHills; 111 LAFD personnel remain in defensive firefighting operations with no injuries reported. LAFD Public Information Officer Firefighter David Ortiz en route ETA 4:15 AM.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; AR1 BC12 BC14 BC15 BC5 CM40 CM42 E239 E24 E260 E27 E274 E288 E289 E293 E298 E60 E73 E75 E77 E87 E89 EA1 EM14 EM15 HE2 HR3 PI2 RA77 RA89 RA98 RS3 SQ87 T39 T60 T74 T88 T89 T93 T98 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 17; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire #RandallFire 11/30/2022 INC#0123

item.description: Update #RandallFire Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0123; 03:30AM; 10930 W Randall St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Vlry3j; #ShadowHills; 104 LAFD personnel remain in defensive firefighting operations at what is known as the "Randall Fire", the blaze currently involves *one* 50' x 150' one-story commercial structure with fire through the roof, as well as parked vehicles and a large amount of vegetation and debris, with flames threatening at least two adjacent commercial structures. The firefight continues with no injuries reported.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; AR1 BC12 BC14 BC15 BC5 CM40 CM42 EA1 E239 E24 E260 E27 E274 E288 E289 E293 E298 E60 E73 E75 E77 E87 E89 EM14 EM15 HE2 HR3 RA77 RA89 RA98 RS3 T39 T60 T74 T88 T89 T93 T98 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 17; Brian Humphrey

Fatal Traffic Collision; INC#1407; 05:04PM; 5828 N Kester Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Uyc3Ed; #VanNuys; PRELIM: Reported vehicle vs. motorcycle collision with one person (unknown age / gender / believed to be the motorcyclist), discovered deceased beneath the vehicle. No other injuries reported. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #3162) and Coroner.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; E102 E288 RA90 RA99 T88 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Rescue; INC#0852; 12:37PM; 18900 W Braemore Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3VezUtB; #PorterRanch; PRELIM: Adult female with an arm injury, sustained in a fall (unknown circumstances) approximately 10' down a steep hillside. First arriving LAFD ground crews will handle. They have rappelled to the patient, to secure her physically, stabilize her injuries, and anticipate using a rope rescue system to bring to her to safety. No further details.; FS 8; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC10 BC15 E275 E288 E289 E8 E88 E90 EM15 H1 H4 H6 HA1 HA4 HA6 HR3 RA18 RH114 T75 T88 T89 UR88 UR89; CH8; 13; Brian Humphrey

No structure threat. No injury.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; AO1 BC12 BC15 BC17 CM40 CM42 E104 E105 E106 E28 E290 E296 E305 E70 E8 E87 E90 EM17 H2 H3 H4 HA2 HA3 HA4 RA106 T105 T90 T96 + VCFD; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

Fatality Traffic Collision; INC#0696; 11:47AM; 13820 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/32NAPem; #Sylmar; PRELIM: Two vehicle collision. Teenage male driver of sedan deceased and remains at scene after colliding with pickup truck and striking pole. 56 year-old male driver of pickup truck transported by LAFD Paramedics to an area hospital in fair condition with non-life threatening injuries. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #1574); FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; E275 E91 EM15 RA81 RA891 RA898 RA91 T75; CH8; Brian Humphrey
